snippet: Olympus acknowledged paying advisory fees totaling $687 million, partly confirming claims made by its former chief.
lead_paragraph: Olympus acknowledged paying advisory fees totaling $687 million, partly confirming claims made by its former chief.

headline.main: Olympus in Apparent Reversal on Payments to Advisers
headline.print_headline: Olympus in Apparent Reversal on Payments to Advisers
